channel.title: The Lost Lennon Tapes
channel.description:
The Lost Lennon Tapes was an American music documentary series presented by Elliot Mintz, comprising a three-hour premiere episode and 218 one-hour episodes, broadcast on Westwood One Radio Network between 24 January 1988 and 29 March 1992. The premiere episode features an introduction from John Lennon’s wife, Yoko Ono, explaining why she chose to give Westwood One Radio access to the tapes on which the shows’ content is based. She described the selection of Elliot Mintz as the presenter not so much as a choice, but a “karmic destiny”, as Mintz had been a close friend of the Lennons for some time.

Some of the recordings featured throughout the series also appear on the Beatles Anthology documentary series, which began three years after the final broadcast of this radio series.
channel.itunes:author: Westwood One

item.title: Sean Lennon Interview, pt. 1
item.description:
The Lost Lennon Tapes

Show #88-06 for broadcast the week of Frbruary 1, 1988

Segment 1

  • Incue: Music + “And now, Westwood One presents…”
  • Billboard: Budweiser
  • Content:
    • “I Wanna Hold Your Hand” - The Beatles
  • Commercials:
    • :60 - Budweiser
    • :30 - Halls
  • Outcue: “…right after this.”

Segment 2

  • Incue: Music & “Welcome back…”
  • Content:
    • Sean Ono Lennon Interview Premiere
    • “Life Begins At 40” - John Lennon
  • Commercials:
    • :60 - Motel 6
    • :30 - Duration
  • Outcue: “…when we return.”

Segment 3

  • Incue: Music & “Now, back to…”
  • Content:
    • Working Class Hero Interview continues
    • “Mother” - John Lennon
    • “I Am the Walrus” - The Beatles
  • Commercials:
    • :60 - Budweiser
    • :30 - Halls
  • Outcue “…right after this.”

Segment 4

  • Incue: Music & “Welcome back…”
  • Content:
    • “Blue Suede Shoes” (Partial) - Plastic Ono Band / Live Peace
    • “Cold Turkey” - Plastic Ono Band / Live Peace
    • “Give Peace A Chance” - Plastic Ono Band / Live Peace
    • “Power To the People” - John Lennon
  • Commercials:
    • :60 - Motel 6
    • :30 - Duration
  • Outcue: “…when we return.”

Segment 5 (music out)

  • Incue: Music & “We're back…”
  • Content:
    • “Cleanup Time” - John Lennon
    • John & Yoko on “Two Virgins”
    • “Imagine” - John Lennon (live)
  • Outcue: “…thanks for listening.”
